definitions.definition: upset because something you hoped for has not happened or been as good, successful, etc. as you expected
definitions.sensetop: disappointed at somethingdisappointed by somethingdisappointed about somethingdisappointed about somebody (not) doing somethingdisappointed in somebody/somethingdisappointed with somebody/something/yourselfdisappointed to see, hear, etc.disappointed (that)…disappointed (not) to be…

examples.text: The singer has promised to refund any disappointed fans.
to be extremely/very/a bit/a little disappointed
